entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -19.3°C
Wind: W 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
